item.title: Data for Everyone: Breaking Down the Barriers to Business Intelligence
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: In the modern enterprise, we’re told that data is our most valuable asset. But for many, it remains locked away, accessible only to a select few. The process is all too familiar: a question arises about a campaign, a ticket is filed, and days—or even weeks—later, a report arrives. By then, the opportunity to act may have already passed. This delay, this friction between question and answer, is a major bottleneck to agility and growth.
